```{r}
x <- seq(0, 2*pi, length.out = 100)  # 100 points from 0 to 2Ï€
y <- sin(x)                          # sine of each x
plot(x, y, type = "l")               # 'l' means line plot
plot(x, y, 
     type = "l", 
     col = "blue", 
     lwd = 2,
     main = "Plot of sin(x)",
     xlab = "x (radians)",
     ylab = "sin(x)")
lines(x, cos(x), col = "red", lwd = 2)
legend("topright", legend = c("sin(x)", "cos(x)"),
       col = c("blue", "red"), lwd = 2)


```
